name: Fred Wedlock
description: '''Peter Frederick Wedlock''' (23 May 1942 – 4 March 2010) was an English [[folk music|folk]] singer best known for his UK [[hit record|hit]] [[single (music)|single]] "The Oldest Swinger in Town", which was covered by German comedian [[Karl Dall]] as "Der Ã¤lteste Popper der Stadt". He performed at many venues in Britain and Europe, presented programmes for [[West Country]] TV and acted with the [[Bristol Old Vic]], as well as undertaking after-dinner speaking engagements.
